QuestData.Title: The Old Map
QuestData.Description: The old, faded leather is falling apart, but still legible.$B$BScrawled on it is some kind of map, and the following lines:$B$B$BDeep in the valley where four winds blow,$BThe maiden laughs behind her golden fan.$BAt the feet of her ancestors' stair,$BShe whispers secrets into the echoing dark.
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the map to Fish Fellreed at Cattail Lake or Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
